title: Gargoyle

params.defense: Aura *(You have no defense if there's four or more Rocks alive, Basic if there's three, Powerful if there's two, and Invincible if there's only one.)*

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Go berserk at someone's house each night, dealing a Powerful attack to them and everyone who visits them, including you.

desc:
Post 426
*Watching over patiently. Soon, its unholy night will come.*
